summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court / The Emperor Waltz Double Feature Review Date: 2014/10/13 Store: Bing Crosby (Actor), Rhonda Fleming (Actor), Billy Wilder (Director), Tay Garnett (Director) & 1 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy Product Description: ['A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur\'s Court: Bing Crosby stars in this light and lively musical version of Mark Twain\'s timeless comedy. Der Bingle is a turn-of-the-century blacksmith who is knocked unconscious only to awaken in sixth-century Camelot. But thanks to some American know-how, the crooner is quickly hailed as a wiz of a wizard and granted the right to teach Rhonda Fleming, the King\'s fetching niece, some decidedly contemporary romantic tricks. Alas, there\'s trouble afoot when Bing locks "magical" horns with the all-powerful Merlin and is challenged to a joust by Sir Lancelot for the hand of the beautiful princess! Co-starring Sir Cedric Hardwicke and William Bendix, the classic fantasy also features a marvelous score by Jimmy Van Heusen and Johnny Burke, along with such hits as "Busy Doing Nothing" and "Once and for Always." The Emperor Waltz: Just imagine: Viennese royalty, elegantly dressed ladies, dashing courtiers, and Bing Crosby in his old straw hat sharing the Danube and the court of Emperor Franz Joseph. It\'s a recipe for sure-fire fun. Bing plays Virgil Smith, an American phonograph salesman whose fox terrier companion takes a fancy to the persnickety poodle of countess Johanna Augusta (Joan Fontaine). While some may call it puppy love, it turns out that romance is not just going to the dogs. Virgil\'s openness and congeniality start to melt the icy coolness of the Viennese royal, who struggles with whether or not to dare defy convention in her tradition-oriented homeland. The lush scenery provides a gorgeous backdrop for the wooing and canoeing that take place in the land of blue rivers and Strauss waltzes. Add an element of good old American humor and Bing\'s smooth sounds, and The Emperor Waltz is a delightfully entertaining trip to the musical wonders of old Vienna, Hollywood-style. Music, merriment, and romance blend blissfully while Bing sings "Friendly Mountains" and "I Kiss Your Hand, Madam," and Strauss melodies fill the air. This film is a real treat for fans of all ages.', 'Bonus Content:', "Disc 1 - A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court:", 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Recommendations', 'Recommendations', ']]>'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1022640', 'Director': 'Billy Wilder, Tay Garnett', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC', 'Run time': '3 hours and 34 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 6, 2003', 'Actors': 'Bing Crosby, Rhonda Fleming, Joan Fontaine, William Bendix', 'Subtitles': 'French, English, Spanish', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0), Unqualified', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: A connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court is a classic. The other movie is good, too. The movie is loosely based on Mark Twain's classic story-- sticking with the highlights. This interpretation has just the right mix of music and story-telling. The cast is great. If you like Bing Crosby, this movie is a can't miss. Review Title: The other movie is good, too Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Salsa Dance DVD Video SalsaCrazy Series, Volume 1 - Salsa Dancing Guide for Beginners - Step by Step Dance Club Lesson Review Date: 2014/11/22 Store: Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Special Interests Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Salsa Dance!', "The ultimate step by step guide to salsa dance, from your very first steps. This is the first DVD in SalsaCrazy's progressive 3 DVD", "Beginner's Salsa Dance System", ", and SalsaCrazy's 5 DVD Progressive", 'Salsa Dance Mastery System', '(both available on Amazon). This DVD starts from the very beginning, and lays the foundation for salsa dance to get you started simply and easily, step by step.', 'Why learn to Salsa Dance?', "It's fun, social, and a passion that will last you a lifetime! The benefits to health, fitness, coordination, and lifestyle will be far beyond what you can imagine now! Anyone can, and should, learn to Salsa Dance. Give it a try, with the finest beginners dance DVD on the market. It's finally here -", 'your definitive guide to learn to salsa dance', ". Don't miss this fantastic DVD that really walks you, step-by-step, through all the fundamentals of Salsa Dancing in a fun, social and energetic way.", 'Volume 1 is the', 'beginners handbook', '. Learn to move in minutes and be out on the floor in record time. A video for anyone & everyone! We cover every aspects of what Salsa is all about. Includes a couple of great moves and ladies styling tips that will get you noticed. A full 2 hours of stellar dance instruction you can use tonight!', "WHAT IS ON THE VIDEO: Join SalsaCrazy as we help you to understand the important basic concepts that will enable you to understand what you are doing and when to do it. If you've been wanting to learn, but thought that it would be too complicated - have no fear - this method is fast and best of all EASY!", 'Review', 'This DVD made learning Salsa not only painless but fun and before long, my partner and I were actually moving through the steps and, better yet, we actually KNEW what we were doing. We looked like the dancers on the DVD, if only a "touch" less professional (okay, a lot less professional but it WAS our first time). Now we\'re working our way through the DVDs, Learn to Dance Salsa 2 and Learn to Dance Salsa 3 and I can actually say that we are getting better and better all the time. Plus, it is a lot of fun to practice!', "What makes this DVD a standout? The instructors start out by explaining the basics of Salsa so that once you work into the actual dance movements, you have some idea of what Salsa actually is and where it fits in the dance spectrum. You aren't just mimicking steps but actually expressing a certain mood and feeling. That is a major plus right there. If you are going to Salsa, you want to create a total effect, not look like a robot going through the motions.", "The instruction itself is very easy to follow, with both full-length and close-up shots of the dancers' feet, going at a very easy, step by step pace at first and gradually working up to a brisker tempo. We found ourselves smiling from start to finish, amazed at how much fun this was. Be forewarned, however- depending on your partner, you may be compelled to take a few romantic interludes as Salsa can be amazingly sexy and just moving together in rhythmic harmony while practicing the moves that lead one's thoughts to further romance...but that's another plus, to my way of thinking (think of it as a free bonus, if you will). --K. Corn - Amazon.com Top 100 Reviewer / Vine Voice"] Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Educational', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'SalsaCrazy.com', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.53 x 5.12 x 7.76 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0899787000064, 0899787000057', 'Director': 'SalsaCrazy.com', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours', 'Release date': 'December 21, 2004', 'Actors': 'SalsaCrazy.com', 'Studio': 'Giddyup Films', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Great, so far. My wife and I started learning salsa in a few short minutes. Review Title: Learning is Fun Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/11/29 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Liz Friedlander'], 'Producers': ['Christopher Godsick', 'Michelle Grace', 'Diane Nabatoff'], 'Starring': ['Antonio Banderas', 'Alfre Woodard', 'Dante Basco'], 'Studio': ['New Line']} Review Text: If you love dance, this movie is a must-see. The tango scene is the best in any film I have seen. My wife and I really love Latin dances, salsa in particular, but, tango, although it originated in Argentina, is not considered a Latin dance. Watch this movie and you'll agree, the tango has just as much passion as Latin dance. Antonia and Katya are fiery-hot in that number.

Based on a true story, this movie is inspiring. It's a feel-good flic with a fantastic story, great music, great dance, and a talented cast. Review Title: Smokin' Hot Tango, Great film! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Shall We Dance? Review Date: 2014/12/28 Store: Richard Gere (Actor), Jennifer Lopez (Actor), Peter Chelsom (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy Product Description: ['Golden Globe winner Richard Gere and Jennifer Lopez step out in a delightfully sexy comedy with a sizzling all-star cast! John Clark is a meek workaholic who feels trapped in a dull, mindnumbing existence. But one night, his whole life changes when the sight of a beautiful dance instructor (Lopez) inspires him to break out of his mold and sign up for some fancy footwork- if he expects to keep his exciting new passion a secret from his family and friends. Also starring Academy Award winner Susan Sarandon and Stanley Tucci!'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': "Steve Martin, Sarah LaFleur, Tamara Hope, Simon Fields, Matt Gordon, Omar Benson Miller, Anita Gillette, Stanley Tucci, Mya Harrison, Richard Jenkins, Sandra Caldwell, Ja Rule, Jennifer Lopez, Lisa Ann Walter, Bobby Cannavale, Chantelle Leonardo, Beatriz Pizano, Sean O'Brian, Peter Chelsom, Geri Hall, Diana Marquis, John O'Connell, Richard Gere, Nick Cannon, Gary McDonald, Candace Smith, Susan Sarandon, Stark SandsSteve Martin, Sarah LaFleur, Tamara Hope, Simon Fields, Matt Gordon, Omar Benson Miller, Anita Gillette, Stanley Tucci, Mya Harrison, Richard Jenkins, Sandra Caldwell, Ja Rule, Jennifer Lopez, Lisa Ann Walter, Bobby Cannavale, Chantelle Leonardo, Beatriz Pizano, Sean O'Bria… See more", 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 46 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MRML30500DVD', 'Director': 'Peter Chelsom', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 46 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 26, 2011', 'Actors': 'Richard Gere, Jennifer Lopez, Lisa Ann Walter, Stanley Tucci, Susan Sarandon', 'Producers': 'Simon Fields', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: This remake is as good as the original in many respects. The sound track is modernized a bit and there are a few minor scene changes, but, over all, it is pretty faithful to the original. Richard Gere did a fantastic job, Jennifer Lopez was wonderful. Review Title: Wonderful Movie! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom Review Date: 2019/12/31 Store: Chris Pratt (Actor), Bryce Dallas Howard (Actor), J.A. Bayona (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ["Includes a digital copy of\xa0Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom Features High Dynamic Range (HDR) for Brighter, Deeper, More Lifelike ColorOn Set with Chris & BryceThe\xa0Kingdom\xa0EvolvesReturn to HawaiiIsland ActionAboard the ArcadiaBirth of the IndoraptorStart the Bidding!Death by DinoMonster in a MansionRooftop ShowdownMalcolm's ReturnVFX EvolvedFallen Kingdom: The ConversationA Song for the\xa0KingdomChris Pratt's Jurassic Journals"] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '2.39:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Director': 'J.A. Bayona', 'Media Format': '4K', 'Run time': '2 hours and 9 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 18, 2018', 'Actors': 'Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Rafe Spall, Justice Smith, Daniella Pineda', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Producers': 'Frank Marshall, Patrick Crowley, Belen Atienza, Steven Spielberg', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Derek Connolly, Colin Trevorrow', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: My wife loves the Jurassic Park movie series. This is the last one made and the one we needed to complete the series. The regular Blue-ray versions were crisp and clear, the 4K movie is even better. You will need a genuine 4K player to view this movie. Review Title: Fantastic GIFT from my wife. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

But thanks to some American know-how, the crooner is quickly hailed as a wiz of a wizard and granted the right to teach Rhonda Fleming, the King\'s fetching niece, some decidedly contemporary romantic tricks. Alas, there\'s trouble afoot when Bing locks "magical" horns with the all-powerful Merlin and is challenged to a joust by Sir Lancelot for the hand of the beautiful princess! The Emperor Waltz: Just imagine: Viennese royalty, elegantly dressed ladies, dashing courtiers, and Bing Crosby in his old straw hat sharing the Danube and the court of Emperor Franz Joseph. It\'s a recipe for sure-fire fun. Bing plays Virgil Smith, an American phonograph salesman whose fox terrier companion takes a fancy to the persnickety poodle of countess Johanna Augusta (Joan Fontaine). While some may call it puppy love, it turns out that romance is not just going to the dogs. Virgil\'s openness and congeniality start to melt the icy coolness of the Viennese royal, who struggles with whether or not to dare defy convention in her tradition-oriented homeland. The lush scenery provides a gorgeous backdrop for the wooing and canoeing that take place in the land of blue rivers and Strauss waltzes. Add an element of good old American humor and Bing\'s smooth sounds, and The Emperor Waltz is a delightfully entertaining trip to the musical wonders of old Vienna, Hollywood-style. This is the first DVD in SalsaCrazy's progressive 3 DVD", "Beginner's Salsa Dance System", ", and SalsaCrazy's 5 DVD Progressive", 'Salsa Dance Mastery System', '(both available on Amazon). This DVD starts from the very beginning, and lays the foundation for salsa dance to get you started simply and easily, step by step.', 'Why learn to Salsa Dance?', "It's fun, social, and a passion that will last you a lifetime! The benefits to health, fitness, coordination, and lifestyle will be far beyond what you can imagine now! Anyone can, and should, learn to Salsa Dance. Give it a try, with the finest beginners dance DVD on the market. It's finally here -", 'your definitive guide to learn to salsa dance', ". Don't miss this fantastic DVD that really walks you, step-by-step, through all the fundamentals of Salsa Dancing in a fun, social and energetic way.", 'Volume 1 is the', 'beginners handbook', '. Learn to move in minutes and be out on the floor in record time. A video for anyone & everyone! We cover every aspects of what Salsa is all about. Includes a couple of great moves and ladies styling tips that will get you noticed. A full 2 hours of stellar dance instruction you can use tonight!', "WHAT IS ON THE VIDEO: Join SalsaCrazy as we help you to understand the important basic concepts that will enable you to understand what you are doing and when to do it. If you've been wanting to learn, but thought that it would be too complicated - have no fear - this method is fast and best of all EASY!", 'Review', 'This DVD made learning Salsa not only painless but fun and before long, my partner and I were actually moving through the steps and, better yet, we actually KNEW what we were doing. We looked like the dancers on the DVD, if only a "touch" less professional (okay, a lot less professional but it WAS our first time). Now we\'re working our way through the DVDs, Learn to Dance Salsa 2 and Learn to Dance Salsa 3 and I can actually say that we are getting better and better all the time. Plus, it is a lot of fun to practice!', "What makes this DVD a standout? The instructors start out by explaining the basics of Salsa so that once you work into the actual dance movements, you have some idea of what Salsa actually is and where it fits in the dance spectrum. You aren't just mimicking steps but actually expressing a certain mood and feeling. That is a major plus right there. If you are going to Salsa, you want to create a total effect, not look like a robot going through the motions.", "The instruction itself is very easy to follow, with both full-length and close-up shots of the dancers' feet, going at a very easy, step by step pace at first and gradually working up to a brisker tempo. We found ourselves smiling from start to finish, amazed at how much fun this was. Be forewarned, however- depending on your partner, you may be compelled to take a few romantic interludes as Salsa can be amazingly sexy and just moving together in rhythmic harmony while practicing the moves that lead one's thoughts to further romance...but that's another plus, to my way of thinking (think of it as a free bonus, if you will). --K. Corn - Amazon.com Top 100 Reviewer / Vine Voice"] Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Educational', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'SalsaCrazy.com', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.53 x 5.12 x 7.76 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0899787000064, 0899787000057', 'Director': 'SalsaCrazy.com', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours', 'Release date': 'December 21, 2004', 'Actors': 'SalsaCrazy.com', 'Studio': 'Giddyup Films', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Great, so far. My wife and I started learning salsa in a few short minutes. Review Title: Learning is Fun Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/11/29 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Liz Friedlander'], 'Producers': ['Christopher Godsick', 'Michelle Grace', 'Diane Nabatoff'], 'Starring': ['Antonio Banderas', 'Alfre Woodard', 'Dante Basco'], 'Studio': ['New Line']} Review Text: If you love dance, this movie is a must-see. The tango scene is the best in any film I have seen. My wife and I really love Latin dances, salsa in particular, but, tango, although it originated in Argentina, is not considered a Latin dance. Watch this movie and you'll agree, the tango has just as much passion as Latin dance. Antonia and Katya are fiery-hot in that number.

Based on a true story, this movie is inspiring. It's a feel-good flic with a fantastic story, great music, great dance, and a talented cast. Review Title: Smokin' Hot Tango, Great film! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Shall We Dance? Review Date: 2014/12/28 Store: Richard Gere (Actor), Jennifer Lopez (Actor), Peter Chelsom (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy Product Description: ['Golden Globe winner Richard Gere and Jennifer Lopez step out in a delightfully sexy comedy with a sizzling all-star cast! John Clark is a meek workaholic who feels trapped in a dull, mindnumbing existence. But one night, his whole life changes when the sight of a beautiful dance instructor (Lopez) inspires him to break out of his mold and sign up for some fancy footwork- if he expects to keep his exciting new passion a secret from his family and friends. Also starring Academy Award winner Susan Sarandon and Stanley Tucci!'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': "Steve Martin, Sarah LaFleur, Tamara Hope, Simon Fields, Matt Gordon, Omar Benson Miller, Anita Gillette, Stanley Tucci, Mya Harrison, Richard Jenkins, Sandra Caldwell, Ja Rule, Jennifer Lopez, Lisa Ann Walter, Bobby Cannavale, Chantelle Leonardo, Beatriz Pizano, Sean O'Brian, Peter Chelsom, Geri Hall, Diana Marquis, John O'Connell, Richard Gere, Nick Cannon, Gary McDonald, Candace Smith, Susan Sarandon, Stark SandsSteve Martin, Sarah LaFleur, Tamara Hope, Simon Fields, Matt Gordon, Omar Benson Miller, Anita Gillette, Stanley Tucci, Mya Harrison, Richard Jenkins, Sandra Caldwell, Ja Rule, Jennifer Lopez, Lisa Ann Walter, Bobby Cannavale, Chantelle Leonardo, Beatriz Pizano, Sean O'Bria… See more", 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 46 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MRML30500DVD', 'Director': 'Peter Chelsom', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 46 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 26, 2011', 'Actors': 'Richard Gere, Jennifer Lopez, Lisa Ann Walter, Stanley Tucci, Susan Sarandon', 'Producers': 'Simon Fields', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: This remake is as good as the original in many respects. raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual displays a consistent preference for classic and family-oriented cinematic experiences, particularly favoring performance-centric genres like musicals and dance-related films. They rate these products highly, often reflecting strong appreciation for storytelling and music elements, as seen in their admiration for the balance of music and narrative in classic comedies.

The purchase history shows a clear attraction to engaging, entertaining content—especially films that incorporate dancing—suggesting a genuine interest in dance as both a social activity and a source of enjoyment. This is highlighted by their purchases of both salsa instruction and dance-themed movies, indicating a passion for learning and practicing dance styles.

Quality appears to be a recurring theme in their selections, with multiple products receiving ratings above 4.5, suggesting a preference for high-quality productions and content, regardless of format (DVD, Blu-ray). Price sensitivity is less evident in this dataset; instead, the focus seems to favor enjoyment and engagement in premium entertainment experiences, with an openness to investing in both classic films and instructional content. 

Overall, this individual’s core preferences encompass a blend of nostalgia for classic films, enthusiasm for musical and dance narratives, and an inclination towards effective learning mediums in dance.

target_interaction.title: Too slow paced
target_interaction.text: It will take you quite a while to get through the whole routine on this tutorial. It is very slow paced.
target_interaction.title_meta: Tai Chi For Beginners DVD: 8 Tai Chi Beginner Video Workouts. Easy Tai Chi Routines. includes Gentle Tai Chi for Seniors to increase Strength, Balance & Flexibility
description: is the perfect way to explore and experience the numerous benefits of Tai Chi, no matter what shape you are in. This ancient, physical & meditative practice of the Yang style 24 posture form is designed to build strength, improve health & flexibility, reduce stress, increase energy flow, promote health & wellness and relax your mind. These

teach the Tai Chi postures with clear, step-by-step instructions. The routines are low-impact with modifications taught for less-flexible people. World-renowned Tai Chi master Chris Pei leads you through customized lessons ranging from 10 to 30 minutes. This safe and effective program is suitable for every body, all ages and schedules.

to learn the Yang style Tai Chi 24 form . - Easy to follow, step-by-step instructions.  - Exclusive Interview with the instructor.  - Modifications of poses for less-flexible people.  - Routines from 10 - 30 minutes  - Over 3.5 hours of instruction
